page.title: 10Kimberley Leisure Centre
page.content: Kimberley Leisure Centre is on the site of the comprehensive school, on Newdigate Street. It is available for many different sports and activities. There are{two swimming pools,}a small pool, and a larger 20m pool. The centre has a large{hall}which is used for 5 a-side football, cricket, table tennis, trampolining, karate, basketball and lots of other things. There's a{gymnasium}with equipment for keep fit and gymnastics and there are{four squash courts. Outside there's a great{all weather {floodlit area}for sports like football or athletics. The centre has other non-sporting things too. There is a solarium, a cafe that looks onto the swimming pool and a lounge bar that looks out onto the hall and the pool. In the lounge are some games and a pool table.
